title: Video: Disclosure – F For You (ft. Mary J. Blige)
body:
How do you go about improving on one of the best songs of last year? Getting **Mary J.**

**Blige** to feature on it obviously. BRIT nominated duo **Disclosure** have just released this version of _F For You_ featuring nine time Grammy award winning Blige with additional vocals. A sonic and visual delight, check it out below.

excerpt.full: How do you go about improving on one of the best songs of last year? Getting Mary J. Blige to feature on it obviously. BRIT nominated duo Disclosure have just released this version of F For You featuring nine time Grammy award winning Blige with additional vocals. A sonic and visual delight, check it out \[…\]
